Advanced user guideline—extend ATOmiCS toolbox¶

This tutorial provides an advanced user guideline on how to extend ATomiCS toolbox to work with different governing equations, preprocessing and postprocession components, new solvers, addtional design variables, different outputs that are not already implemented by the developers of ATomiCS tool.

list of extensions¶

  • Define a new PDE
  • Implementing a customized computation for preprocessing or postprocession or outputs
  • Potentially implementing a new solver
  • Adding additional design variables, constraints or changing to a different objective

Indices and tables¶

  • Search Page
